Synopsis: TV series based on the New York Times' column that explores relationships, love and the human connection.
Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.
A heartwarming and emotional story about a unique set of triplets, their struggles, and their wonderful parents.

Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Her last date with disaster? That of having accepted to work as Santa's elf for a department store. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.
Teenage friends find their lives upended by the wonders and horrors of puberty.
Four people and their otherworldly frienemy struggle in the afterlife to define what it means to be good.
A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Movie_Name: The Art of Racing in the Rain
Synopsis: Through his bond with his owner, aspiring Formula One race car driver Denny, golden retriever Enzo learns that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate the journey of life.
Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.
A struggling musician realizes he's the only person on Earth who can remember

Movie_Name: The End of the F***ing World
Synopsis: James is 17 and is pretty sure he is a psychopath. Alyssa, also 17, is the cool and moody new girl at school. The pair make a connection and she persuades him to embark on a road trip in search of her real father.
Jilted by her husband on the eve of embarking on an African safari, a woman travels to the continent alone where she meets an elephant conservationist.
A father recounts to his children, through a series of flashbacks, the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.
A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.
A group of friends becomes motivated to living fuller lives after the unexpected death of a close friend.

Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.
Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.
A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

Movie_Name: A Rainy Day in New York
Synopsis: A young couple arrive in New York for a weekend where they are met with bad weather and a series of adventures and misadventures.
Gay lawyer Will and straight interior designer Grace share a New York City apartment. Their best friends are gleeful and proud gay Jack and charismatic, filthy-rich, amoral socialite Karen.

Journalist Fred Flarsky reunites with his childhood crush, Charlotte Field, now one of the most influential women in the world. As she prepares to make a run for the Presidency, Charlotte hires Fred as her speechwriter and sparks fly.
A newly sober single mom tries to pull her life together in Napa Valley while dealing with her wayward mother.
This contemporary romantic comedy, based on a global bestseller, follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.
Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.
The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham, a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall.
While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.
A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.
Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the 1990s.
A New York cop and his wife go on a European vacation to reinvigorate the spark in their marriage, but end up getting framed and on the run for the death of an elderly billionaire.
Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.
A troubled youth becomes embroiled in the lives of a close-knit group of people in the wealthy, upper-class neighborhood of Newport Beach, Orange County, California.
An extremely pampered African Prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and will.
Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
After being mistaken for younger than she really is, a single mother decides to take the chance to reboot her career and her love life as a 26-year old.

At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.
A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.
Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.
In a small town on Christmas Eve, a snowstorm brings together a group of young people.
A young woman disenchanted with love mysteriously finds herself trapped inside a romantic comedy.
When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.
Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.
A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.
CGI and live-action re-imagining of the 1955 Disney classic.
Millie comes to town in the roaring twenties to encounter flappers, sexuality and white slavers.

Movie_Name: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
Synopsis: Five years after the events of
A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.
A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.
Based on the real-life events of the Durrell family as they resettle from England to Greece.
